title: betlily
author: betlily
content: Founded in 2022 by the visionary Glenn Rellum, BETLILY (https://www.betlily.com/) has swiftly ascended the ranks to establish itself as a prominent player in the online gaming industry. With its inception rooted in innovation and a commitment to excellence, BETLILY now boasts a user base spanning more than 60 countries, reflecting its truly global footprint.Key Highlights:Extensive Gaming Catalogue: BETLILY (betlily.com) offers a rich and diverse gaming experience, covering everything from classic casino games to an expansive sportsbook, catering to both seasoned punters and newcomers alike.Global Workforce: Driving the brand forward is a team of over 120 dedicated professionals. Passionate about gaming and customer satisfaction, this workforce is the backbone that ensures a top-notch gaming experience for all BETLILY users.Trust and Credibility: As a testament to its integrity, BETLILY operates under the stringent regulations of the Anjouan (Comoros) Gaming License authority. This regulation not only ensures fair play but also underscores BETLILY's commitment to transparent operations and user security.Headquarters and Global Presence:LILY ENTERTAINMENT LIMITED: Headquartered at 128 City Road, London, EC1V 2NX, United Kingdom, it stands as a testament to BETLILY's commitment to maintaining a strong European presence.Lily Entertainment N.V.: Marking its footprint in the Caribbean, BETLILY's secondary office is strategically located at Zuikertuintjeweg Z/N (Zuikertuin Tower), Cura√ßao.Founder and Leadership: Glenn Rellum, an industry stalwart, is at the helm of BETLILY. Under his leadership, the brand has consistently expanded its reach, resonating with users across continents. His forward-thinking approach and passion for gaming have been instrumental in the brand's meteoric rise in the industry.In a world where online gaming platforms are aplenty, BETLILY distinguishes itself through its unmatched user experience, integrity, and commitment to innovation. Whether you're an avid gamer or someone exploring the world of online casinos and sportsbooks, BETLILY promises an experience like no other.
